title: Youth Fellowship Meeting
description: Join us for an inspiring youth fellowship meeting where we'll share testimonies and grow together in faith.

title: Community Outreach Program
description: Help us serve the community by participating in our monthly outreach program to make a difference.

title: Sunday School Teacher Training
description: Special training session for all Sunday school teachers to learn new teaching methods.

title: Church Anniversary Celebration
description: Celebrate with us as we commemorate another year of God's faithfulness and blessings.

title: Bible Study Workshop
description: Deepen your understanding of God's word through interactive Bible study sessions.
